column5: Cute cottage in quiet, historic neighborhood just a couple minutes from I- 45 south and minutes from downtown Houston and NRG. This home is located practically in the heart of Houston, there's ample parking in the extra wide driveway and a great backyard plus covered carport. The 3rd bedroom will feature a blow up mattress and there's additional sleeping for 1 more guest in the living room. This home can accommodate up to 7 persons. Perfect rental home for Super Bowl.
column8: Cute Cottage in the City only 8.9 miles from NRG
